proof_script:
lemma Continuous_cond [closure]: assumes "Continuous F" "Continuous G" shows "Continuous (\<lambda> X. F(X) \<triangleleft> b \<triangleright> G(X))"
using assms Continuous_def continuous_def
by pred_auto
